sect2.title: More modules

row.entry: More modules at the bottom of right panel is used to hide modules you don't use. As a default only standard modules are shown to the user, so if you are missing anything you should check here and show it.

sect2.para: Each modules is shown as a small icon and the module name. Left-click with your mouse to toggle a module's status: visible, hidden or favorite. Favorite modules are indicated by a star in front of the icon and will additionally to their normal module group show up in module group "favorites". This is a good way to get fast access to modules that you use very frequently. Visible modules are indicated in the list by a light grey background. Hidden modules have a dark grey background; they will not display any controls whatsoever.
